sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';

import {
  BrowserRouter as Router,
  Route,
  Redirect,
} from "react-router-dom";
import { NavBar } from '../components'
import { Login, Admin, OrdersHistory, Home, ManageUsers, Register } from '../pages'

  const isAuth = true;
const PrivateRoute =  ({ component: Component, ...rest})=>(
  <Route {...rest} render={(props)=>(
    isAuth===true
    ? <Component {...props}/>
    : <Redirect to="/"/>
  )}/>
)

class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <Router>
        <Route exact path="/">
          <Login />    
        </Route>
        <PrivateRoute exact path="/home">
        <NavBar></NavBar>
          <Home />
        </PrivateRoute>
        <PrivateRoute exact path="/admin">
        <NavBar></NavBar>
          <Admin path="../pages" />
        </PrivateRoute>
        <PrivateRoute exact path="/admin/register">
        <NavBar></NavBar>
          <Register path="../pages" />
        </PrivateRoute>

        <PrivateRoute exact path="/admin/ManageUsers">
        <NavBar></NavBar>
          <ManageUsers path="../pages" />
        </PrivateRoute>
        <PrivateRoute exact path="/admin/ordershistory">
        <NavBar></NavBar>
          <OrdersHistory path="../pages" />
        </PrivateRoute>


      </Router>
    )
  }
}
export default App
